fullName.jp: ヴェイン・カルダス・ソリドール

description.jp:
アルケイディア帝国の次期皇帝候補。
ソリドール家の命脈を保つためならば
手段を選ばない野心家。周辺国への
侵略行為や バッシュをダルマスカ国王
暗殺犯に仕立て上げるなど 数々の謀略
を講じた。巧みな演説で人心を掌握する
一面もあり 帝王学にも長けている。
description.gl: A candidate for the next emperor of Archadia、 this ambitious man will do whatever it takes to preserve House Solidor. He has taken aggressive measures toward neighboring countries and framed Captain Basch for the assassination of the King of Dalmasca. He is also a skilled politician and persuasive speaker who can sway people's hearts.

jp.text: ソリドールの剣に 迷いは不要
新たな歴史のはじまりを告げよう
どうやら私は 覇王になりそこねた
君の願いは別の人間に託してくれ
すべてはソリドールのために…
ラーサーはあれでよい

gl.text: The sword of House Solidor cannot be left to rust in doubt.
You must find another. One who might realize your ambitions.
And so House Solidor lives on.
Larsa is as he should be.

name.jp: コールアビリティ_ヴェイン

rank_up_desc.en: When using [Force of Will (C)]\n• Increases BRV potency by 180%\n• Call Effect duration +3
rank_up_desc.jp: 「嶄然震撼【C】」使用時\n・BRV威力極大アップ\n・使用後特殊効果の3ACTION期間延長

desc.en: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.gl: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.jp: 近距離物理攻撃\n相手のBRVを奪う攻撃

desc.en: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.gl: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.jp: 自身のBRVを消費して\n相手のHPを削る攻撃

desc.en:
3-HIT melee BRV attack
Grants 1 stack of [Conqueror's Power] for 2 turns (max is 3)

While [Conqueror's Power] is at 3 stacks:
• Becomes [Mach Wave+]
　∟ No Action Delay
　∟ Does not increase turn count
　∟ Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

[Conqueror's Power] lowers enemy Attack
desc.gl: 3-hit melee BRV attack\nSelf: 2 turns 1 level of Conqueror's Power (limit 3)\nBecomes Mach Wave+ with 3 levels of Conqueror's Power
desc.jp: 3HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃\n自身に2ACTION「覇者の力」1段階付与（上限3）\n「覇者の力」3段階付与中 「マッハウェイヴ＋」に変化

desc.gl: Conqueror's Power: Lowers all enemies' ATK (does not stack)
desc.jp: 覇者の力：敵全体の攻撃力が減少する（同名の強化効果は重複しない）

desc.en:
2-HIT melee BRV + HP attack
Cancels target's BREAK status
Follows up with a 4-HIT melee BRV + HP Attack
Grants [Consul's Ingenuity] for 3 turns
※BREAK Bonus is only applied once

While [Consul's Ingenuity] is active:
• [BRV Attack] becomes [Kick]
　∟ 2-HIT melee BRV attack
• [HP Attack] becomes [Rush]
　∟ 2-HIT melee BRV + HP attack

While [Conqueror's Power] is at 3 stacks:
• [Force of Will] becomes [Force of Will+], [Kick] becomes [Kick+], [Rush] becomes [Rush+]
　∟ No Action Delay
　∟ Does not increase turn count
　∟ Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

[Consul's Ingenuity] raises party Max BRV and Attack
desc.gl:
2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
Cancels target's Break
4-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
Self: 3 turns Consul's Ingenuity
May collect only 1 Break Bonus per use
BRV Attack becomes Kick, HP Attack becomes Pummel while Consul's Ingenuity active
Becomes Force of Will+ with 3 levels of Conqueror's Power
desc.jp:
2HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃後
対象のブレイク状態を解除
＋4HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
自身に3ACTION「執政官の智略」付与
「嶄然震撼」使用中のブレイクボーナスは1回分まで
「執政官の智略」付与中
通常「BRV攻撃」が「蹴り」に変化し
通常「HP攻撃」が「ラッシュ」に変化
「覇者の力」3段階付与中 「嶄然震撼＋」に変化
